description.value: You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world that allows you to communicate with them on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Make an Impression] on animals and to make very simple @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Request]{Requests} of them. In most cases, wild animals will give you time to make your case.
